app.title: GenAI Content Assistant
apiKey.error: Please enter a value for the API key. You can use a placeholder value, but if you do, GenAI reports will not function properly.
apiKey.intro: To use GenAI, you need to add an OpenRouter API key. This key will be saved locally in your browser for your requests. We will never see your key.
apiKey.instructions:
If you don't have an API key yet, follow these steps to create one:

  1. Create an account at openrouter.ai.
  2. In the top right hamburger menu, select "Keys".
  3. Create a key and save it.
    • You will only see your key once after creating it. Copy and save it somewhere secure.
    • The point of this is to prevent misuse if you bought credits on your account.
    • You don't need to buy credits to use the free models included in this demo.
    • If you'd like to try other models or use a paid model with your credits, let us know so we can update the available selections.
  4. Once you have your key, paste it into the input box above to save it locally. The key will not be sent to us, so we will not see it.

project.content: The first feature of the project assistant will be to retrieve the description and keywords metadata from a set of inputed pages into a table.
about.content: The DDPD GenAI Project is tracking progress towards various use cases to improve web optimization using generative artificial intelligence tools.

404.message:
404: Synergy Not Found

This page failed to align with our Q3 objectives and has been offboarded.
We appreciate your commitment to innovation by discovering this undocumented feature.

What now?

  • Regroup on homepage
  • Escalate to someone else's to-do list
  • Or just stare into the void for a bit. We won't judge.
